verses.verse: And when Abram <S%H87><s%> was ninety <S%H8673><s%> <S%H8141><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to Abram <S%H87><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, I am 'El SHaddai <S%H7706><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>; walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8690><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%>, and be thou perfect <S%H8549><s%>.
And I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> between me and thee, and will multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%>.
And Abram <S%H87><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%>: and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with him, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,
As for me <S%H589><s%>, behold, my covenant <S%H1285><s%> is with thee, and thou shalt be a father <S%H1><s%> of many <S%H1995><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>.

Neither shall thy name <S%H8034><s%> any more be called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8735><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>, but thy name <S%H8034><s%> shall be Avraham <S%H85><s%>; for a father <S%H1><s%> of many <S%H1995><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> have I made thee <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And I will make <S%H6509><s%> thee exceeding <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> fruitful <S%H6509><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> of thee, and kings <S%H4428><s%> shall come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of thee.

And I will establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> between me and thee and thy seed <S%H2233><s%> after thee <S%H310><s%> in their generations <S%H1755><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>, to be a 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> unto thee, and to thy seed <S%H2233><s%> after thee <S%H310><s%>.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee, and to thy seed <S%H2233><s%> after thee <S%H310><s%>, the land <S%H776><s%> wherein thou art a stranger <S%H4033><s%>, all the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> possession <S%H272><s%>; and I will be their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Avraham <S%H85><s%>, Thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> therefore, thou, and thy seed <S%H2233><s%> after thee <S%H310><s%> in their generations <S%H1755><s%>.

This is my covenant <S%H1285><s%>, which ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, between me and you and thy seed <S%H2233><s%> after thee <S%H310><s%>; Havahry man child <S%H2145><s%> among you shall be circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8736><s%>.
And ye shall circumcise <S%H5243><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your foreskin <S%H6190><s%>; and it shall be a token <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> betwixt me and you.

And he that is eight <S%H8083><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shall be circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8735><s%> among you, every man child <S%H2145><s%> in your generations <S%H1755><s%>, he that is born <S%H3211><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%>, or bought <S%H4736><s%> with money <S%H3701><s%> of any stranger <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%>, which is not of thy seed <S%H2233><s%>.

He that is born <S%H3211><s%> in thy house <S%H1004><s%>, and he that is bought <S%H4736><s%> with thy money <S%H3701><s%>, must needs <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8736><s%> be circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: and my covenant <S%H1285><s%> shall be in your flesh <S%H1320><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

And the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> man child <S%H2145><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin <S%H6190><s%> is not circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>; he hath broken <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Avraham <S%H85><s%>, As for Sarai <S%H8297><s%> thy wife <S%H802><s%>, thou shalt not call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her name <S%H8034><s%> Sarai <S%H8297><s%>, but <S%H3588><s%> Sarah <S%H8283><s%> shall her name <S%H8034><s%> be.

And I will bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> her, and give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee a son <S%H1121><s%> also of her: yea, I will bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> her, and she shall be a mother of nations <S%H1471><s%>; kings <S%H4428><s%> of people <S%H5971><s%> shall be of her.

Then Avraham <S%H85><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon his face <S%H6440><s%>, and laughed <S%H6711><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, Shall a child be born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto him that is an hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>? and shall Sarah <S%H8283><s%>, that is ninety <S%H8673><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1323><s%>, bear <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ?
And Avraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, O that <S%H3863><s%> Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%> might live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before thee <S%H6440><s%> !

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Sarah <S%H8283><s%> thy wife <S%H802><s%> shall bear <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee a son <S%H1121><s%> indeed <S%H61><s%>; and thou shalt call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>: and I will establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and with his seed <S%H2233><s%> after him <S%H310><s%>.

And as for Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%>, I have heard thee <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: Behold, I have blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him, and will make him fruitful <S%H6509><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and will multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%>; twelve <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8147><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> shall he beget <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and I will make him <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>.

But my covenant <S%H1285><s%> will I establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, which Sarah <S%H8283><s%> shall bear <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee at this set time <S%H4150><s%> in the next <S%H312><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>.
And he left off <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> talking <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> with him, and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from Avraham <S%H85><s%>.

And Avraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and all that were born <S%H3211><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%>, and all that were bought <S%H4736><s%> with his money <S%H3701><s%>, every male <S%H2145><s%> among the men <S%H582><s%> of Avraham's <S%H85><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>; and circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of their foreskin <S%H6190><s%> in the selfsame <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, as 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> had said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto him.

And Avraham <S%H85><s%> was ninety <S%H8673><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%>, when he was circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8736><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin <S%H6190><s%>.

And Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> was thirteen <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, when he was circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8736><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin <S%H6190><s%>.
In the selfsame <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> was Avraham <S%H85><s%> circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.

And all the men <S%H582><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%>, born <S%H3211><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%>, and bought <S%H4736><s%> with money <S%H3701><s%> of the stranger <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%>, were circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8738><s%> with him.
